BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
 
 
 OpenCV => 3.3
 Operating System / Platform => Ubuntu16.04
 Compiler => GCC
 
 <denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
 
 what is the meaning of following comment on rotateCalipers function in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/3.3.1/modules/imgproc/src/rotcalipers.cpp>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/3.3.1/modules/imgproc/src/rotcalipers.cpp</denchmark-link>
 ?
 <denchmark-code>	 ((CvPoint2D32f*)out)[0] - corner
 	 ((CvPoint2D32f*)out)[1] - vector1
 	 ((CvPoint2D32f*)out)[0] - corner2
 </denchmark-code>

comments_0.comment_text:
probably a type. from the code it should be:
 ((CvPoint2D32f*)out)[2] - vector2
